author: makortel
body:
This PR backports #13959 and #14070 from CMSSW_8_1_X to CMSSW_8_0_X. Original descriptions by @VinInn 
#13959

> Technical mods to ParticleFlow (and some core classes) to speedup creation for PFRecHIt and PFClusters.
> Most of it is trivial.
> I did not observe any regression on TTBAR PU35 reco.
> Includes contribution by @lgray
> 
> added major speedup in ES geometry and EcalRecHit creation
> 
> p.s. shrink_to_fit is still calling RefCore copy constructor instead of moving as it should....
#14070

> avoid stalls due to memory fence.

The first commit (7cf0c3b) is actually from #13831. It is included here because #13959 depends on it, and the dependence is only a single commit whose intention is not to change any behaviour. The entire #13831 is not backported at this time because it causes tiny regressions due to numerics.
#14070 is included because it depends on #13959, and causes no changes in RECO quantities.

Tested in CMSSW_8_0_14, no changes expected in RECO quantities in here either.

@fwyzard @gennai @slava77 @VinInn @lgray
title: Backport of #13959: SpeedUp ParticleFlow for HLT; and #14070: remove memory fence
